verbose_text: In support of this, Foxp3 + CD4 + Tregs have been found to expand in the spleen and the liver of mice infected with T. congolense, limiting IFN-gamma production via their secretions of IL-10.
evidence: Foxp3 +  CD4 +  Tregs have been found to expand in the spleen and the liver of mice infected with T. congolense, limiting IFN-gamma
